div.p:
praāsādato bhartuḥ parāṅmukhīṃ rudatīm māninīm aparadhābhyanujñā
nena kṛtapremṇāṃ svabhāvabhaṅguravarṇanayā māninivṛttiṃ sakhī prārthayate |

lg.l: ehi erisa ccia gaī mā ruvvasu tassavaliamuhaandam |
sakhī īdṛśy eva gatir mā rodīḥ tryaśravalitamukhacandram |

div.p:
erisa ccia īdṛśy eva mā ruvvasu mā rodīḥ | tassa tryaśra vālukkī vālukī
kukkuṭī mānopaśamopāyeṣu sāmādiṣu bhedo 'yam | yathoktaṃ | bhedas tattvapārjanam i
ti svakīyāsu madhyam ādhīrodheyam ubhayālaṅkāra upamā | yatra kvacit upalabdhahra
syarasopavarṇanacchalena bhartari priyasakhī rahasyavṛttasya lajjayātmano nāveditasya
prakārāntareṇa parijñānaja .... prakāśayantī sakhyāha |

lg.l: maraṇe tumaṃ bhaṇissaṃ maraṇaṃ pi silānaṇijjasse ||
satyaṃ jānāti draṣṭuṃ sadṛśe jane yujyate rāgaḥ |
... bhaṇiṣyāmi maraṇam api ślāghanīyam asyāḥ | iti |

div.p:
sa tāvad ramyam eva ramyatayā jānāti | deśatatsatyam eva | nanu ttvatpakṣapātenocyate | tataś cātmano 'nurūpe tvayy anurāgo bhavann ucita eva | tathā vā syāssadasatjñānanaipuṇe
nirapavāde yadi tvan na labhyase | sāvaśyam maraṇam āsādayet | etad api bhavatv eva | na punar eva sarvair api guṇair ātmanaḥ susadṛśīs tvadalābhād vipadyamānām api yaḥ svayam eva nābhyavāpadyase | tat tvāṃ kiñcid brūyām | tvām abhaṇatyāṃ mayi dvayaṃ hi sambhāvyate | bhavatā svayam eva yad abhyavapattir vā anabhyavapattau tasyaā maraṇaṃ vā | tatra hy avapattir asaṃbhāviteti mava | tasya susadṛśaprārthanānimittatvād ity arthaḥ | uktaṃ hi vātsyāyanīye | daśa tu kāmasya sthānāni | cakṣuḥ prītiḥ manassaṅgaḥ saṅkalpotpattir nidrāccheda ... tā pi vipayebhyo vyāvṛttir lajjāpraṇāśa unmādo maraṇam iti | tatra daśamīn daśāṃ prāpteyam | sahasābhyavapatyā 'nukampanīyā iti hṛdayam | parakīyāsūttamādaṣīra(?)pragalbheyam | sūkṣmo 'laṅkāraś catuśsītiñ ca dūtabhedāḥ | yathoktaṃ bhojena | ``jātir guṇaḥ kiyādgavyaṃ sambandho prayojanaṃ prayogo yojyatā sītvaṃ dūtabhedeṣu hetavaḥ |'' tataḥ jātito devo manuṣyaḥ | kinnaro vā naraḥ | śaṅkaśārikā pārāvatovato haṃsa iti | guṇataḥ pitṛpitāmaham adṛṣṭavaikṛtasampādakalobhaśīlamahāyyamammantas tāvithārbhikam | (?) bharasahiṣṇuveti | kiyātaḥ sahapāṃsukrīḍitam upakārasambandhañ janmāntarārbhitaṃ sambhāvya hasamānaśīlavyasanaṃyaścāsya rahasyāni marmāṇi vidyāt | yasyā ca vidyāddhāvyayatyañ ca sahasaṃ vṛddham iti | anyadgavyataḥ mālākāratāṃ būlībhāṇḍilasaurikapīṭhamardaviṭavidūṣakapābaṇḍino mitrāṇi | sambandhataḥ gurussaravā śiṣyassaravādhyāyī ātmājñātirau rasaḥ kanīyān iti | anyataḥ anyonyapraidhātaḥ | sahānyatāprāpti- pramaraṇamānṛṇyaṃ kīrtiḥ | prītir iti prayojanatasnehaḥ kutūhalam abhiprāyopalambha | pūrvaprārthanā 'nyataraprārthanāśīlasaṅkarṣa iti prayogataḥ pracchannaḥ prakāśaḥ hīnaḥ utkṛṣṭaḥ | uddhataḥ udāttaḥ dhṛṣṭaś śaṭha iti yogyatāya nisṛṣṭārthā parimitārthā palahāriṇī
sūka dūtī svayandūtī vā tadūtī mūḍhadūtī bhāryādūtī chadmadūtī mantradūtīti dvādaśaḥ strītvād īkṣaṇikābhi??kī sakhī dhānteyikā vidhavā dāsī śilpakārikā śilanīti | tatra nisṛṣṭārtheyam dūtī | uktaṃ hi | nāyakasya nāyikā vā manīṣinamātram upalabhyas svabuddhyā kāryasampadinī nisṛṣṭārtheti |
